column5: As someone who started playing in 1983, 90 percent of my characters were written up on lined paper. We mimicked the format of the sheet in the in the back of the books but I also short handed a stat block format for NPC's based on the short write ups you would see in the adventure modules. I still have 4 spiral notebooks of old AD&D characters and Marvel Super heroes box set from TSR.
A friend recommended the melatonin gummies to me in June and I can honestly say I can get to sleep and stay sleeping now with no narcotics.
